title: RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12006 PIR Module Overview
content: The RAK12006 is a Pyroelectric Infrared Radial (PIR) module. It is designed to detect occupancy and motion from the infrared radiated objects. The sensor uses AM312 from Senba Sensing Technology Co., Ltd.
parent_content: The RAK12006 is a Pyroelectric Infrared Radial (PIR) module. It is designed to detect occupancy and motion from the infrared radiated objects. The sensor uses AM312 from Senba Sensing Technology Co., Ltd.

title: RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module Mounting Mechanism
content:
The RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module can be mounted on the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12006 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12006 mounting mechanism on a WisBlock Base module
parent_content:
The RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module can be mounted on the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12006 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12006 mounting mechanism on a WisBlock Base module

title: RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > Vendor and Part Number Information [TABLE]

title: RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12006 WisBlock PIR Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12006 WisConnector Pinout and Power Supply Configuration
content:
The RAK12006 module has a 40-pin WisConnector that is compatible with the WisBlock Base IO Slot. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition are shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **Image:** RAK12006 Pinout Schematic  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- Only **Digital OUT**, **3V3**, and **GND** are connected to WisConnector.  
- An optional **3V3_S** supply voltage can be used to turn ON or OFF the RAK12006 module through the IO2 pin. This can be helpful in low-power applications.
parent_content:
The RAK12006 module has a 40-pin WisConnector that is compatible with the WisBlock Base IO Slot. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition are shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **Image:** RAK12006 Pinout Schematic  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- Only **Digital OUT**, **3V3**, and **GND** are connected to WisConnector.  
- An optional **3V3_S** supply voltage can be used to turn ON or OFF the RAK12006 module through the IO2 pin. This can be helpful in low-power applications.  
- To disable the default **3V3** supply and use the alternative **3V3_S** supply source, the resistor jumper R1 must be 0Ω and R2 must be NC (not connected).

content: - To disable the default **3V3** supply and use the alternative **3V3_S** supply source, the resistor jumper R1 must be 0Ω and R2 must be NC (not connected).
parent_content:
The RAK12006 module has a 40-pin WisConnector that is compatible with the WisBlock Base IO Slot. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition are shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **Image:** RAK12006 Pinout Schematic  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- Only **Digital OUT**, **3V3**, and **GND** are connected to WisConnector.  
- An optional **3V3_S** supply voltage can be used to turn ON or OFF the RAK12006 module through the IO2 pin. This can be helpful in low-power applications.  
- To disable the default **3V3** supply and use the alternative **3V3_S** supply source, the resistor jumper R1 must be 0Ω and R2 must be NC (not connected).
